title: Man's Suit Coat, 1960-88-9-a, 1750–1770
dimensions: H x W (neck to hem): 113.5 cm (44 11/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of International Business Machines Corp.
description: Man's suit coat in yellow-green ribbed silk lined with undyed linen. Self-covered buttons down the front, along the pocket flaps, around deep cuffs, and at top and sides of side vents. Coat has a small standup collar, no lapels, and three brass hooks and eyes for closing the front which slopes towards the sides of the body. Hangs to the knees.
